page.title: 17Guston Village - General
page.content: Guston has 80 houses, nearly all semi-detached. The council estate has 40 houses. The play area has swings and a climbing frame. There is a bus stop, telephone box, a post box and 'The Chance Inn' pub. The old school in now the village hall, and the old police station is used for police accomodation. There are no shops within 2 miles. Most residents go out to work, except middle-aged or young house wives. Most have moved to Guston in recent years. There are few children of school age. The people shop and work in Dover. Most have a car, because the bus service is unreliable. Few people use the church.
